Articles.Content: Is there a keyboard combination or keyboard mouse combination that will allow direct entry or fine adjustment of the PAW slider values in the VAB/SPH? I can't seem to get my servos set back to 0.0. I know you can do it in the controller but I will be using the Axis group.

10 minutes ago, Rich T said:

Is there a keyboard combination or keyboard mouse combination that will allow direct entry or fine adjustment of the PAW slider values in the VAB/SPH? I can't seem to get my servos set back to 0.0. I know you can do it in the controller but I will be using the Axis group.

All I've found for this situation is to close the PAW, rotate the camera slightly, and reopen the PAW.  Or sometimes do that and/or lift my mouse off the pad and move it an inch or 2 in a random directions.  I know of no keyboard controls that decrease mouse inputs nor of any way to type in values directly.

Do you know if there's a UI scaling setting that enlarges the PAW?
